snippet.title: Red and the Whispering Woods Gameplay Trailer (Voice Controlled Game)
snippet.description:
DOWNLOAD HERE: https://mikeyren.itch.io/redvoicegame

In this voice controlled video game you play as Little Red. Use whispers and SCREAMS to control her as she makes her way through the dark woods. Can you make it to Grandma's house?

About the Game:
Red and the Whispering Woods is a re-imagining of the classic Little Red Riding Hood tale. The game attempts to subvert some of the damsel-in distress tropes of the traditional story and reflect on a darker truth. In this game, Little Red has agency while she faces a threat that’s closer to home than the original. It’s a spooky journey into the woods and I hope you enjoy the game.
